g1.title: @etcd - Distributed Key-Value Store
g1.description: Implement production-ready @etcd operator with cluster operations, watch functionality, distributed consensus, and leader election

g2.title: @elasticsearch - Search & Analytics Engine
g2.description: Implement @elasticsearch operator with full search, indexing, aggregations, cluster management, and real-time analytics

g3.title: @consul - Service Discovery & Health Checking
g3.description: Implement @consul operator with service registration, health checking, KV store, and service mesh coordination

g4.title: @vault - Secrets Management & Encryption
g4.description: Implement @vault operator with secret storage, dynamic credentials, encryption as a service, and key rotation
